select t1.id, t1.personid, t1.grade, t1.givenname, t1.issuer, t1.getdate, t1.teachingmanagement, t1.studentmanagement, t1.politicalcounselor, t1.psychologicalconsultant, t1.employmentoffice, t1.expertise, t1.workinghours, t2.name from T_TAB_STAFF t1 ,T_RS_EMPLOYEE t2 where 1=1 and t1.personid = t2.person_id and t1.type = #{type}
and t1.GIVENNAME like #{groupNameSel}

SELECT decode(DEPT_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || DEPT_NAME) as "label", decode(DEPT_ID, '', t.person_id, DEPT_ID || ',' || t.person_id) as "value" FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE t LEFT JOIN (SELECT R.PERSON_ID PERSON, D.DEPT_NAME, D.DEPT_ID FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT R, T_SYS_DEPT D WHERE R.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID) ON T.PERSON_ID = PERSON WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1' and t.person_id = #{personid}
